name: domenyX Generations
summary:
domenyX's 5th birthday as a streamer is coming! Time to prepare a big party for their subscribers...

Things are going well and then... XYNEMOD is back with an evil plan to take over all the worlds by dragging both domenyX's from different worlds into the mysterious TIME DIMENSION!

Enjoy 30 exits and nostalgic boss battles based on the previous domenyX hacks series across many different worlds. You can play with two different versions of domenyX (classic and modern) by playing with a friend on TWO PLAYER MODE!

What mysteries await the domenicis on this journey? Good luck!
